countries.title: Countries
countries.france: Known for its gastronomy and rich cultural heritage.
countries.unitedKingdom: An island nation recognized for its history and diversity.
countries.spain: A sunny country famous for its beaches and lively culture.
countries.japan: Land of the rising sun blending tradition and technology.
countries.china: Vast country with ancient history and rapid modernization.
countries.saudiArabia: Famous for its deserts and historical significance.
countries.thailand: Well known for its hospitality, temples, and beaches.
countries.morocco: Country of contrasts with vibrant culture and desert landscapes.
countries.brazil: Colorful nation known for Carnival and the Amazon rainforest.
countries.canada: Land of lakes, forests, and multicultural cities.
countries.australia: Continent-country with beaches, wildlife, and adventure.
countries.germany: Strong economy and rich historical and cultural influence.
countries.unitedStates: A land of opportunity with diverse landscapes and cultures.
